channel.title: Mr Frisby
channel.description: STUART FRISBY IS A DESIGNER BASED IN AMSTERDAM

item.title: Hello World
item.description: This is an example of how you can set up a blog with RSS, and an archive using Wintersmith. If you want a bare bones example check out the site in examples/basic/ in the repository root or use wintersmith new --template basic when creating a new site.
